# KISSY

> A Powerful Collection Of Modules

## Vision

模块化，跨终端，高扩展性，组件齐全，接口一致，自主开发，适合多种应用场景

## Build

```
npm install bower -g
npm install
bower install
npm run build
```

## Modules

[http://kissyteam.github.io/badgeboard/](http://kissyteam.github.io/badgeboard/)
